layibiriyawe sahanasewa sandaha gos sitiyadi rogiwu mema waidyawarayata prathikara kirima sandaha jorjiyawata ragena gos aththe wisheshitha waidya upakarana saha pahasukam sahitha yanayakin me wanawita aැtlantahi emori rohale prathikara labana ema waidyawarayage thaththwaya yahapath bawa pawasana waidyawarunge adahasa wi aththe ebola walakwima sandaha paryeshana mattame athi ෙaushadha pilibanda paryeshana katayuthu waha waha kadinam kala yuthu bawayi.ebola sandaha soyagath ennath sapthambar masaye sita roginta laba dimata amarikawe “jathika aasathmika ha bowana roga aayathanaya” wisinawasara illa thibune mema ennatha rogaya walanduna kshirapayi sathunata labadimen sarthaka prathipala athwubawata labagath paryeshanagara sakshida sahithawayi.thawaduratath paryeshana mattame pawathi ema aushadha ebola aasadhithayinata labadimata pasugiyada loka saukhya sanwidhanaye awasara labadi thibini.

kaluthara disthrikkaya thula pihiti sulu warimarga sanwardhanaya kirime wadapiliwelak me warshaya thula kriyathmaka kere.kaluthara disthrik lekam yu. di. si jayalal mahathage pradhanathwayen pawathi kaluthara disthrik krushikarmika kamitu raswime di mema karunu anawarana wu bawa kaluthara disthrik madhya eekakayen wartha we.kaluthara disthrikkayata ayath gowi jana sewa bala pradesha 20 thula pihiti sulu warimarga sanwardhanaya kirima mangin disthrikkaye danata puranwa pawathina kumbauru akkara dahas gananak yalith dekannayema aswaddima apeksha kere.mema wadapiliwela kriyathmaka kirima sandaha aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaya mangin kaluthara disthrikkayata wen kara athi mudala rupiyal laksha 950 ki..

ekanehima sarashwawathi darshayanawuwaya - purwa nimiththen oda wadunawu wishwanaththeme uththara rama charithayata uwamana wu raga siyallama kra manukulawa prstharakelen thama swamiya wu jon da silwa mahatha paminathek maga balamin sitiyeya- samadama udaye 5 pasu wethma wijaya mandiraye midula amadima purudu kala jonda silwa mahatha edina udayehida eya nimakota muhuna soda gathpasu sisil aaharak bhukthiwinda the bi hamarawa nithara purudu wu suruttuwada dalwa gath pasu thama mulika natya yawu uththararama charitha pusthakayada athata gena kamarayaka sita wishwanath lauji sangithagnyaya wetha gos ohu athathamin “wiswanath adata dawas hatha hari kohomada umbae kalpanawa” yi asiya- ‘mahathmaya kiyanna oonakala raga siyallama ada liyaganna”yi sangithagnyatheme kiyamin thama sarpinawa wadyana kota winadi 30 k pamana swaraga uchcharanakota dakwiya - eka nehijon da silwa mahatha galgasina - wiswanath pandiwaratheme kala githochcharanayeha wadyayehida athi wu dakshabhawaya gana pudumawi asipiya nohela balasiti jon da silwa mahatha thama adahasa ituwubawin pridathiyenuth prisathiyata pathwa waha waha thama granthadayata uchimanakala raga siyallama ekawarama sampurnamakara gaththen edina sita wiswanaththeme lakdiwa shresashta sangithagnyayada wiya- eeta desathiyakata pasu jon da silwa shre shta sangithagnyayada wiya- eeta desathiya kata pasu jon da silwa mahatha uththara rama charitha natya purudu puhunu kirime katayuthu wijaya mandiurayehima aarambha keleya.
